resources.string:
Coming soon. Pages dispatched through CodeMessaging can be delivered without incurring text messaging fees. And received on Android tablets. Stay tuned for further details
 
 What"'"s new in this release
 
 If you run past a demo expiration, Cadpage won"'"t trigger on calls. It will record them in history and let them fall through to your normal messaging app.
 
 New Locations:
 Pottawattamie county, IA
 Albany county, NY
 Orange county, NY
 Wayne county, NY
 Cabarrus county, NC (alternate)
 Northampton county, NC
 Franklin, OH
 Geauga county, OH
 Wayne county, OH (alternate)
 Somerset county, PA
 Richard county, SC
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Livingston county, MI
 Salem county, NJ
 Chautauqua county, NY
 Buncombe county, NC
 Johnson county, NC
 York county, SC
 Minnehaha county, SD
 
 General fixes:
 A lot of little improvements have been made to the way we generate the search string sent to Google Maps.
